org.rcsb.mmtf.codec

Interface CodecInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CharCodecs, FloatCodecs, IntCodecs, StringCodecs

    public interface CodecInterface
    Generic interface for an untyped codec strategy
    Author:
    Anthony Bradley

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCodecId() 
      String getCodecName() 

    • Method Detail

      • getCodecName

        String getCodecName()
        Returns:
        the codec name. A string naming the codec.

      • getCodecId

        int getCodecId()
        Returns:
        the codec id. currently an integer defining the codec.
